import React, { useState } from "react"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import "./styles.css"; function AdminNavigationBar(props) { const [click, setClick] = useState(false); const logOut = () => { props.setAdmin(false) setClick(!click)} const handleClick = () => setClick(!click); return ( <>

); } export default AdminNavigationBar;
